***** Marathi[edit] *****
**** Particle[edit] ****
दां • (dā̃)
   1. signifying time or times
            एकदा
                  ekdā
                  once
            बहुतदा
                  bahutdā
                  many times
**** References[edit] ****
    * Molesworth,_James_Thomas (1857), “दा”, inA dictionary, Marathi and
      English, Bombay: Printed for government at the Bombay Education Society's
      Press
***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
From Classical_Newar 𑐡𑐵𑐩 (dāma), ultimately from Sanskrit द्रम्म (dramma), from
Ancient_Greek δραχμή (drakhmḗ).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [dãː]
**** Noun[edit] ****
दां • (dāṃ) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐡𑐵𑑄)
   1. (money) currency
